parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: EncodeType
parameters.description:
The encryption type. Valid values:

*   RSA
*   OCT

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Jwks
parameters.description: The JWT public key. The JSON format is supported.

parameters.name: KeyName
parameters.description: The name of the key used for JWT-based identity authentication.

parameters.name: KeyValue
parameters.description: The value of the key used for JWT-based identity authentication.

parameters.name: TokenName
parameters.description: The names of the parameters that are required to verify each token. By default, each token is prefixed with Bearer and stored in the Authorization header, such as `Authorization: Bearer <Content of a token>`.

parameters.name: TokenPosition
parameters.description: The positions of the parameters that are required to verify each token. By default, each token is prefixed with Bearer and stored in the Authorization header, such as `Authorization: Bearer <Content of a token>`.

parameters.name: TokenPrefix
parameters.description: The prefixes of the parameters that are required to verify each token. By default, each token is prefixed with Bearer and stored in the Authorization header, such as `Authorization: Bearer <Content of a token>`.
